ISSUE.TITLE: Time estimation wrong on dashboard.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: There's an issue (not a huge one, just a minor thing) with the time estimates on the dashboard ![screen shot 2015-01-13 at 10 22 45 am](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2027925/5724078/97978c28-9b0e-11e4-8c01-6804f145e005.png) Since I find the idea that this repository being 45 years old a little hard to swallow, I figured I'd report it here.
